name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distraction-Free New Tab with Dark Mode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the default New Tab window with a blank screen to remove distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces the default New Tab window with a blank screen to remove distractions. 
* Free, no tracking, no ads
* Dark Mode support
* Fast
* No permissions required
* Minimalist icon design

Install now: Distraction-Free New Tab with Dark Mode
